properties.text: Place cue ball to perform the break.
Place cue ball to perform the break.

Rules for this adapted Blackball Billiard:

- Requires 2 players

- Begin by placing the cue ball for a break (hitting the set balls)

- Players take turns until a red or yellow ball drops into a pocket. If the black ball is potted, the player loses.

- After a red/yellow ball is potted, the player must sink all balls of that color, while the opponent targets the other.

- Players can only pot the black ball after clearing their assigned balls; doing so prematurely results in a loss.

- Potted cue ball results in a loss.

- Legally potting the black ball leads to a victory.

Click anywhere to start...
